challengeFiles.contents:
text = 'Hello Zaira'
shift = 3
def vigenere(message, key):
    alphabet = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
    encrypted_text = ''

    for char in message.lower():
        if char == ' ':
            encrypted_text += char
        else:
            index = alphabet.find(char)
            new_index = (index + offset) % len(alphabet)
            encrypted_text += alphabet[new_index]
    print('plain text:', message)
    print('encrypted text:', encrypted_text)

            new_index = (index + offset) % len(alphabet)
            encrypted_text += alphabet[new_index]

tests.text: You should delete the shift variable and its value.
You should assign the string 'python' to your custom_key variable.

description: Delete your shift variable. Then, declare a new variable called custom_key and assign the value of the string 'python' to this variable.
